channel.title: How to add a dragon claw special?
channel.description: I'm wanting a special for dragon claws in my server, but I have no idea how to do it. Any help?

item.title: How to add a dragon claw special?
item.dc:creator: @Vusta Vusta
item.description:
@Vusta wrote:

You add 8002 into a java file called Special. You should see 2 areas where it says “case (number)”. One on top and one near the bottom. Find any number and put case 8002 under it like the one above it. Search the number that you put it under and put case 8002 under that too.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a dragon claw special?

item.title: How to add a dragon claw special?
item.dc:creator: @The_Disciple The Disciple
item.description:
@The_Disciple wrote:

Alright, when I searched for that in client.java, I found this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(8); usingSpecial = true;

So I assumed that the claws are supposed to have a special, but there’s no special bar. Any idea how this can be fixed?

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a dragon claw special?

Type DCdown in the searching bar.
